snippet: Elzbieta Plackowska is charged with the murders of Olivia Dworakowski, a 5-year-old girl she was baby-sitting, and her own son, Justin Plackowska, 7.
abstract: Elzbieta Plackowska is charged with murder in the deaths of 5-year-old Olivia Dworakowski, girl she was baby-sitting, and her own son, Justin Plackowska; both children were found stabbed to death in the Dworkakowski home in Naperville, Ill, an affluent suburb of Chicago; Plackowska is held without bail and faces mandatory life sentence if convicted.
lead_paragraph: Elzbieta Plackowska is charged with the murders of Olivia Dworakowski, a 5-year-old girl she was baby-sitting, and her own son, Justin Plackowska, 7.

headline.seo: Nanny in Illinois Held in 2 Killings
headline.main: Nanny in Illinois Held in 2 Killings
headline.print_headline: Nanny in Illinois Held in Killing Of Her Son and a Young Charge
